I love this idea! 

Secretary's suggestions sound very practical, and I
know I personally would appreciate a chat
"appointment" and also the archives - I'd like to see
what went on in the chat, seeing as how I don't know
how often I'd be able to participate. Also, many of my
Japanese friends are extremely amused that such a
thing as an English Language Shinsengumi mailing list
exists! 

With best wishes, 

Mio. 

PS. Bunneh, I have not forgotten that I'm linking your
pics for my story when I upload the next chapter - the
problem is getting around to finishing the darn thing.


--- Bunny ^_^ <shenlong71328@...> wrote:


---------------------------------
Alright, this is just an idea I'm throwing out there
for all to  consider.   The Shinsengumi/Edoji/& Spy
division have a  an excellent home and message board
going all thanks to the sweat and  blood of the
presistant fans that keep the mailing lists going 
strong.  My idea was, how 'bout we make a chatroom?   
Maybe not on the actual site but on mIRC... Somewhere
were we can all  meet and chit chat about everything
and anything that comes to  mind.   It'll be a great
way to get to know the memebers of  the 3 mailing
lists.   What do you guys think?
  
  -Bunneh
